Grandma: I need your help, I think Edgar’s parents are
really in danger!#pbUncanny voice: I know what you want, but you can’t save
them all... #pbGrandma: ...I can’t orphan the boy. I must save his parents...#pbUncanny
voice: I need something in return...#pbGrandma: But what could an old lady
offer you? I don’t have valuables to sacrifice.#pbUncanny voice: You know what
I want.#pbGrandma: No! Anything but him, he’s just a child! He’s still got his
whole life to live!#pbUncanny voice: Well, you know what’s going to happen...#pbGrandma:
Are you sure about that?#pbUncanny voice: Yes, his parents are going to die...#pbGrandma:
Is there no other way to save them?#pbUncanny voice: Perhaps. Let’s make a pact...#pbGrandma:
